/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are tall and modern, constructed from brick and glass, reflecting the city's contemporary architectural style. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. The street itself is lined with trees, adding a touch of greenery to the scene. Cars can be seen driving on the road, indicating the city's active lifestyle. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
